page.title: 18HOBBIES IN SKEGNESS
page.content:
We took a survey of the{hobbies of ten {year}old children in class 6 at {Richmond County Primary }school Skegness.here is the chart. DANCING..... 11 ELECTRONICS ..... 2 MUSIC..... 2 READING..... 1 ART..... 5 CONSTRUCTION KITS 1 SPORT..... 9
Dancing has the highest score because both boys and girls can dance and at the moment the boys are very interested in "{break dancing}" which is an acrobatic form of dancing. The sport section includes all sports such as{BMX Bike Riding}which is popular and other sports like football,cricket and judo.
